title: Spiced Pecans
description: Spice coated pecans for the holidays, snacking, or anytime.

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 300 degrees
instructions.step2: Mix dry ingredients with a large mortar and pestle
instructions.step3: Froth egg white and 1-2 tsp water in large bowl with a wire whisk
instructions.step4: Mix nuts in egg white until evenly moist
instructions.step5: Add dry ingredients in two batches, stirring until nuts are coated in spice
instructions.step6: Spread mixture onto 2 large baking sheets that are lined with parchment paper
instructions.step7: Cook for 20-25 minutes, rotating pans once to ensure even cooking

title: Chocolate Crunchies
description: Delicious crunchy chocolate treats for after dinner or with coffee.

instructions.step1: Melt dark chocolate in medium bowl, being careful to heat only enough to melt
instructions.step2: Add melting wafers and mix to melt, heating only if needed
instructions.step3: Combine dry ingredients, mix into chocolate until coated
instructions.step4: Pour onto parchment lined cookie sheet and spread evenly with spatula
instructions.step5: Place into fridge for about an hour until cooled
instructions.step6: Break into cookie sized pieces, keep refrigerated until served

notes: Cashews, pepetas and other nuts may be substituted or mixed with peanuts.

title: Pumpkin Pie
description: Whole wheat crust and traditionally spiced pumpkin filling.

item2.ingredient: salt (less or none if using salted butter)

item4.ingredient: ice water (an additional 1-2 tbsp may be required)

section1.title: Pie Shell
section1.step1: Add flour and salt to food processor work bowl, pulse to mix
section1.step2: Cut butter into chunks, add to food processor work bowl, pulse until mixture resembles coarse meal
section1.step3: With machine running steady add ice water slowly through feed hole, stopping as soon as a ball begins to form
section1.step4: Form into a ball, flatten into a 6-8 inch circle and dust with white flour
section1.step5: Using a rolling pin on a pastry frame or between wax paper sheets roll until about 1/8 in thick and 1 inch larger than pie pan
section1.step6: Using rolling pin or by folding in half carefully transfer dough to 9-10 inch pie pan
section1.step7: Trim and prepare edge as desired, leaving a little overhang to anchor

section2.title: Pumpkin Pie
section2.step3: Pour into whole wheat pie shell and bake for 10 minutes
section2.step4: Reduce heat to 350 degrees and bake for another 40 minutes or until set

notes: Extra dough makes a tasty treat when rolled up with cinnamon sugar and baked in toaster oven. Pie shell may be prepared ahead of time and stored in the fridge. Foil or crust protector may be used for part of the baking time to help prevent over browning of the edge.

title: Pfeffernusse
description: German Pfeffernusse cookies.

instructions.step1: Combine dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a 2 cup measuring cup, lightly beat eggs, add oil and molasses, stir to combine
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients and mix well, chill for several hours
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees
instructions.step5: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking liner
instructions.step6: Bake for 12-14 minutes, cool and coat with powdered sugar

title: Andes Chunk Cookies
description: Mint chocolate chip cookies made with Andes mints.

instructions.step1: Combine flour and baking powders in a bowl
instructions.step2: Beat butter, sugars, vanilla and eggs until mixed
instructions.step3: Mix in Andes chunks, then flour mixture, form into a ball and chill for several hours
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees
instructions.step5: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking liner
instructions.step6: Bake for 10-12 minutes, cool on pan for 2 minutes and then move to cooling rack

title: Tuna Noodle
description: Tuna noodle casserole.

item3.ingredient: cream of mushroom or celery soup (10.5 oz)

instructions.step1: Bring pot of water to a boil and preheat oven to 350 degrees
instructions.step2: Cook macaroni al dente, and drain
instructions.step3: Spray inside of casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray
instructions.step4: Mix tuna, soup, milk and spices in casserole dish, breaking tuna into desired size chunks
instructions.step5: Microwave for a few minutes to warm, or increase covered cooking time by 5 minutes
instructions.step6: Add macaroni and cheese, mix to combine, smooth the surface and sprinkle with bread crumbs and cheese
instructions.step7: Cook covered for 20 minutes, remove lid and cook for another 10 minutes

notes: Add a can of salmon for extra protein and variety.

title: Swedish Pancakes
description: Swedish pancakes (or crepes), rolled up with your favorite fillings.

instructions.step1: Blend ingredients and let sit in fridge for at least 30 minutes
instructions.step2: Heat crepe or non-stick skillet on medium heat
instructions.step3: Melt a small amount of butter in pan for each crepe
instructions.step4: Pour batter in pan to desired size
instructions.step5: Cook until edges are golden and crepe is easily flipped
instructions.step6: Flip and cook half the time on second side
instructions.step7: Serve rolled with lignonberries, jam, sugar and lemon juice, or your favorite inside

notes: Use 2 eggs, 2/3 cup flour and 1 1/2 cup milk to reduce serving size to 8 pancakes.

title: Oven Pancakes
description: Oven baked pancakes with fresh lemon juice and powdered sugar.

instructions.step1: Ingredients are for one pancake, make as many as you want by simply adding
instructions.step2: Preheat oven to 400 degrees
instructions.step3: Add butter and/or spray 9 inch non-stick cake pans, allowing butter to melt just enough to spread as oven heats
instructions.step4: In a medium mixing bowl, beat eggs, mix in milk, add cinnamon and flour, mix until
instructions.step5: Pour batter into pans and cook for 12 minutes
instructions.step6: Remove from pan, place onto plate, squirt lemon juice evenly and cover with powdered sugar

title: Fudge Brownies
description: Decedent fudge brownies with chocolate chips and not too much butter.

instructions.step1: Grease 8x2x2 inch baking pan, preheat oven to 350 degrees
instructions.step2: In medium bowl partially melt chocolate, add butter and finish melting, stir in sugar
instructions.step3: Add eggs and vanilla, beat lightly until just blended (do not over mix)
instructions.step4: Stir in flour, chocolate chips and nuts
instructions.step5: Spread batter in pan, bake for 30 minutes
instructions.step6: Cool, cut into bars

title: Blonde Brownies
description: Blonde brownies with chocolate chips and not too much butter.

instructions.step1: Grease 13x9x2 inch baking pan, preheat oven to 350 degrees
instructions.step2: In medium bowl combine flour, baking powder and salt
instructions.step3: Melt butter, stir in sugar, add eggs and vanilla, beat lightly until just blended (do not over mix)
instructions.step4: Stir in flour, chocolate chips and nuts
instructions.step5: Spread batter in pan, bake for 25 minutes
instructions.step6: Cut into bars while still warm

title: Ginger Carrots
description: Asian style carrots with ginger and teriyaki.

instructions.step1: Wash, trim ends and cut carrots into 1 cm slices
instructions.step2: In a wok or covered medium sauce pan, saute carrots in olive oil over medium low heat for 15-20 minutes until browned and softening
instructions.step3: Remove cover, add shallot, ginger and garlic. Saute for few minutes
instructions.step4: Add teriyaki sauce and pepper, stir to coat thoroughly and remove from heat

title: Sesame Green Beans
description: Asian style green beans with sesame seeds.

instructions.step1: Wash, trim ends and cut beans into 3-4 cm pieces, steam until tender
instructions.step2: In a wok or medium sauce pan, heat sesame oil over medium low heat
instructions.step3: Add beans and garlic. Saute for a couple minutes
instructions.step4: Add soy sauce, pepper and sesame seeds, stir to coat thoroughly and remove from heat

title: Spicy Green Beans
description: Spicy Asian style green beans with sesame seeds.

item5.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Wash, trim ends and cut beans into 3-4 cm pieces, steam until tender
instructions.step2: In a wok or medium sauce pan, heat sesame oil over medium low heat
instructions.step3: Add beans, shallot and garlic. Saute for a couple minutes
instructions.step4: Add soy sauce, vinegar, chili and sesame seeds, stir to coat thoroughly and remove from heat

title: Spicy Cilantro Carrots
description: Spicy Mediterranean style carrots with cilantro.

instructions.step1: Wash, trim ends and cut carrots into 1 cm slices
instructions.step2: In a wok or covered medium sauce pan, saute carrots in olive oil over medium low heat for 15-20 minutes until browned and softening
instructions.step3: Add spices and stir to coat thoroughly, remove from heat and toss with cilantro

title: Guacamole
description: Your basic guacamole as you like.

instructions.step1: Cut avocado in half, remove pit, quarter, peel, and mash with a fork
instructions.step2: Add lemon juice, salsa, salt and pepper, mix well
instructions.step3: Add tomato and cilantro, mix just enough to combine

title: Meat Crumbles
description: Mexican seasoned lean ground turkey for burritos, tacos and many other dishes.

item6.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: In a large skillet, saute onion in olive oil over low heat until translucent
instructions.step2: Mix dry spices in mortar or small bowl
instructions.step3: Add meat to pan and cook until browned, flipping and chopping to make crumbles
instructions.step4: Add dry spices and mix thoroughly to coat meat crumbles
instructions.step5: Add garlic and Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce, turn off stove heat and mix thoroughly as the pan cools down
instructions.step6: Serve in corn or flour tortillas with cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, cilantro, salsa and guacamole as desired

notes: Meat crumbles may be mixed with refried beans, potatoes or served in a bowl with black beans and rice.

title: Cuban Picadillo
description: Cuban style picadillo made with lean ground turkey, almonds, olives, raisins and green pepper.

item14.ingredient: Edmundo, Moscato, Chablis or other sweet white wine

item18.ingredient: Almonds, slivered or sliced and blanched

instructions.step1: In a large skillet, saute onion in olive oil over low heat until translucent
instructions.step2: Add green pepper and garlic to onions, saute for a few minutes
instructions.step3: In a separate skillet cook meat until browned, flipping and chopping to make crumbles
instructions.step4: Add meat and spices to veggies, stir to coat
instructions.step5: Add liquids, olives, almonds and raisins, and simmer for an hour
instructions.step6: Serve over rice with black beans

title: Green Chili
description: Vegetarian green chile or with pork if preferred.

instructions.step1: In a medium sauce pan, saute onion in olive oil over low heat until translucent, add garlic
instructions.step2: In a blender combine tomatillos, green chile and stock, add to sauce pan and cook for 30 minutes
instructions.step3: In a measuring cup mix 1/4 cup water and 2 T cornmeal until no lumps remain, add to sauce for thickening
instructions.step4: Reduce heat and simmer for 15-30 minutes, while making burritos

notes: When making with pork, saute the meat along with the onion and increase the simmer time to achieve the desired tenderness.

title: Red Lamb
description: Moroccan spiced lamb chunks.

item17.ingredient: fresh cilantro and/or toasted almond slices (optional)

instructions.step1: Mix dry spices in mortar or small bowl (note that Ras El Hanout may be used for most spice)
instructions.step2: Cut meat into 1/2 inch cubes and place into a medium bowl
instructions.step3: Massage meat with the spice rub, then cover with plastic wrap and put into the fridge for a couple of hours – ideally overnight
instructions.step4: Heat olive oil in medium fry pan and cook meat for 5-10 minutes over medium-high heat until outside is browned
instructions.step5: Add liquids, bring to boil, reduce heat and simmer covered for 2 hours, adding liquid if needed
instructions.step6: Remove lid and continue cooking until liquid becomes sauce, remove from heat and serve over rice or couscous with garnish

title: Moroccan Meatballs
description: Moroccan spiced sauce with lean ground turkey meatballs.

item3.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

item16.ingredient: fresh cilantro and/or toasted almond slices (optional)

instructions.step1: In a large sauce pan, saute onion in olive oil over low heat until translucent
instructions.step2: Mix dry spices in mortar or small bowl (note that Ras El Hanout may be used for most spice)
instructions.step3: Add crushed tomatoes, stock, spices, stir to mix and cook covered over low heat for 20-30 minutes, stirring as needed to prevent sticking
instructions.step4: In a large bowl combine meatball ingredients, mixing thoroughly, add bread crumbs until desired texture is achieved
instructions.step5: Form into 1 inch balls and lightly brown in non-stick skillet, add to sauce, gently pushing into mixture
instructions.step6: Cook for another 20-30 minutes stirring gently, uncovering as desired for sauce consistency
instructions.step7: Remove from heat and serve over rice or couscous with garnish

title: Roasted Cauliflower
description: Pan roasted cauliflower.

item8.ingredient: lemon or lime cut into wedges (optional)

instructions.step1: Wash and cut/break cauliflower into small florets, add oil and cauliflower to wok
instructions.step2: Cook for 10-15 minutes covered over medium-high heat until cauliflower begins to brown, stirring a couple times to keep from browning too much
instructions.step3: Remove lid and continue to cook, stirring every few minutes until florets turn golden brown
instructions.step4: Add garlic, seasoning, and bread crumbs, cook for about 1 minute stirring constantly, remove from heat and serve with lemon/lime wedges or chopped cilantro

title: Sauteed Spinach
description: Spicy and delicious spinach.

instructions.step1: In a large sauce pan, saute onion and garlic in olive oil over low heat for 1-2 minutes
instructions.step2: Add spinach to pan and cook down, adding pine nuts towards the end
instructions.step3: Add salt, pepper and lemon juice, stir and cook for 1 minute

title: Turkey Sausage
description: Breakfast sausage patties made with lean ground turkey.

item7.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce (optional)

instructions.step1: Using mortar and pestle grind dried herbs and seeds
instructions.step2: Mix all ingredients until evenly distributed, adding additional breadcrumbs as needed
instructions.step3: Preheat non stick skillet on medium heat
instructions.step4: Form into patties about 2 inches in diameter and 1/2 inch thick and place into skillet
instructions.step5: Cook for about 5 minutes per side until browned and done

title: Meatball Marinara
description: Marinara sauce and Italian style meatballs made with lean ground turkey.

instructions.step1: In a large sauce pan, saute onion in olive oil over low heat until translucent
instructions.step2: Using mortar and pestle grind dried herbs, add along with garlic to sauce pan
instructions.step3: Add tomato products, stir to mix and cook covered over low heat for 20-30 minutes, stirring as needed to prevent sticking
instructions.step4: In a large bowl combine meatball ingredients, mixing thoroughly, add bread crumbs until desired texture is achieved
instructions.step5: Form into 1 inch balls and lightly brown in non-stick skillet, add to sauce, gently pushing into mixture
instructions.step6: Cook for another 20-30 minutes stirring gently
instructions.step7: Serve over pasta with fresh grated Parmesan cheese

title: Mediterranean Chicken
description: Stir fry Mediterranean chicken with roasted red peppers, artichokes and sundried tomatoes.

item4.ingredient: roasted red pepper, drained and diced

instructions.step1: In a wok or large sauce pan, saute onion in olive oil over low heat until translucent
instructions.step2: Using mortar and pestle grind dried herbs, add along with garlic and sundried tomatoes to sauce pan
instructions.step3: Add canned products, stir to mix and cook covered over low heat for 20-30 minutes, stirring as needed to prevent sticking
instructions.step4: Add oil to large non-stick skillet and preheat over medium heat
instructions.step5: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step6: Place chicken into skillet and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step7: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step8: Add chicken to sauce mixture, stir to coat evenly, turn off heat, leave covered for a few minutes
instructions.step9: Serve over pasta with fresh grated Parmesan cheese

notes: When using sundried tomatoes in oil, add them with the onion and skip the olive oil. Fresh chopped basil makes a nice addition when adding the chicken to the sauce.

title: Pizza
description: Baked or grilled pizza with whole wheat crust and your favorite toppings.

instructions.step1: Make dough for crust, using bread machine or hand kneaded, coat with olive oil, cover and let rise until double (1-2 hours)
instructions.step2: In a medium mixing bowl, add crushed tomatoes, garlic salt and seasoning
instructions.step3: Using mortar and pestle grind dried herbs, add to sauce mixture and mix, set aside for 20-30 minutes before use
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 400 degrees, coat pizza pans with olive oil and sprinkle with corn meal
instructions.step5: Divide dough in half and form 2 crusts, let rise for 5-10 minutes while oven heats
instructions.step6: Pre bake crusts for 10-15 minutes, until some browning starts, make small cuts after 5 minutes to help prevent bubbles
instructions.step7: Let crust cool for a few minutes, spread with sauce, add toppings and cheese to taste
instructions.step8: Bake until cheese is starting to brown, cool on rack, cut into slices and enjoy

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Grilled salmon on the grill or seared in a pan with mesquite.

instructions.step1: Heat non-stick pan or grill to 325-350 degrees
instructions.step2: Rub seasoning into one side of fillet, cook seasoning side down until half done (~6-8 minutes)
instructions.step3: Flip and cook just until salmon flakes, do not overcook as it will continue cooking after removing from grill

title: Salmon Cakes
description: Salmon cakes made from leftovers with a delicious yogurt sauce.

instructions.step1: Beat egg, add leftover salmon, mix thoroughly, add bread crumbs and form into patties
instructions.step2: Chill for an hour (optional and patties may be frozen for future use)
instructions.step3: Heat oil in non-stick pan to 325-350 degrees
instructions.step4: Add patties to pan, cook uncovered for 5 minutes per side, turning carefully when browned
instructions.step5: Serve with yogurt sauce

title: Thai Baked Salmon
description: Spicy Thai seasoned salmon baked in foil.

item2.ingredient: fresh grated or minced ginger (or 1 tsp powder)

item7.ingredient: sweet chili sauce, Hoisin or sweet and sour sauce

instructions.step1: Heat oven to 400 degrees, cover large cooking sheet with foil and spray with non-stick
instructions.step2: Combine sauce ingredients in a bowl and mix thoroughly into a paste
instructions.step3: Place salmon fillet on foil, spread sauce mixture evenly
instructions.step4: Cover with foil, and bake for 12-20 minutes until salmon flakes, remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes
instructions.step5: Serve with lime wedge and cilantro

title: Hummus
description: Homemade hummus with canned or cooked chickpeas.

instructions.step1: Add tahini, lemon juice and  vinegar to a food processor and blend until smooth
instructions.step2: Add 1 can of chickpeas plus the other remaining ingredients and blend until smooth
instructions.step3: Add second can of chickpeas and blend until smooth
instructions.step4: Add red peppers and blend until smooth
instructions.step5: Add additional salt to taste, serve with dusting of paprika or well with chopped red pepper

notes: Hummus will keep for a week in the fridge in an airtight container.

title: Diced Potatoes
description: Home fries, low fat, crunchy and delicious.

instructions.step1: Wash, then dice potatoes, removing any bruised or bad sections
instructions.step2: Heat oil in non stick pan to around 325-350 degrees, add potatoes and cover
instructions.step3: Turn a few times until all sides are browned and potatoes are almost cooked, remove cover
instructions.step4: Add seasoning to taste, turn to coat, cook for a few minutes, add bread crumbs, turn to coat and remove from heat

title: Sweet Potato Fries
description: Sweet potato fries that are low fat and crunchy.

instructions.step1: Wash, then cut yams into fries, removing any bruised or bad sections
instructions.step2: Soak yams in cold water for an hour, drain and pat dry
instructions.step3: Heat oven to 400-425 degrees, cover large cooking sheet with foil and spray with non-stick
instructions.step4: Coat yams with flour or cornstarch using plastic bag
instructions.step5: In a large mixing bowl drizzle yams with olive oil, sprinkle with seasoning and mix to coat
instructions.step6: Place evenly on baking sheet and place in oven
instructions.step7: Cook for 15 minutes, remove from oven, turn fries and cook for 10-15 minutes until fries are browned
instructions.step8: Sprinkle with sea salt and enjoy

notes: For a different take these can be made like diced potatoes, peel them and be careful as they can burn easily.

title: Korean Meatballs
description: Sweet and spicy Korean style meatballs made with lean ground turkey.

item5.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees, line baking sheet with parchment
instructions.step2: In a large bowl mix all the meatball ingredients, form into 1 inch balls, place on baking sheet, cook for 20-25 minutes
instructions.step3: Meanwhile in medium bowl mix glaze ingredients, add cooked meatballs and toss until coated
instructions.step4: Garnish with chopped chives or green ends of onions
instructions.step5: Serve over noodles or rice

title: Thai Meatballs
description: Thai meatballs made with lean ground turkey in a spicy red peanut curry sauce.

item7.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees, line baking sheet with parchment
instructions.step2: In a large bowl mix all the meatball ingredients, form into 1 inch balls, place on baking sheet, cook for 20-25 minutes
instructions.step3: In a medium sauce pan, saute onion in coconut oil over low heat until translucent
instructions.step4: Add garlic and ginger to onions, saute for a few minutes
instructions.step5: Add Thai seasoning, paste and peanut butter, stir until smooth, reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes
instructions.step6: Transfer meatballs and sauce to a medium bowl and toss until coated
instructions.step7: Serve over rice with lime wedges and cilantro

title: Greek Meatballs
description: Greek meatballs (Keftedes) made with lean ground turkey served with Tzatziki, cucumber and tomato salad

item5.ingredient: fresh mint or spearmint leaves, finely chopped (optional)

instructions.step1: Combine Tzatziki sauce ingredients in a small bowl, mix and put in fridge at least 30 minutes before serving
Preheat oven to 400 degrees, line baking sheet with parchment
instructions.step2: In a large bowl mix all the meatball ingredients, form into 1 inch balls, place on baking sheet, cook for 15-20 minutes
instructions.step3: Prepare Greek salad and artistically arrange on festive plates, drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice or vinegar
instructions.step4: Serve meatballs on salad with a dollop of Tzatziki sauce and fresh parsley

notes: Slice these and make a delicious pita sandwich with lettuce, cucumber, tomato and peppers.

title: Firecracker Meatballs
description: Spicy buffalo style meatballs made with lean ground turkey make a great appetizer or main course.

item3.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees, line baking sheet with parchment
instructions.step2: In a large bowl mix all the meatball ingredients, form into 1 inch balls, place on baking sheet, cook for 20-25 minutes
instructions.step3: Meanwhile in medium bowl mix sauce ingredients, add cooked meatballs and toss until coated
instructions.step4: Serve as appetizers or with beans and rice

title: Poke Bowl
description: Hawaiian style poke bowl.

item7.ingredient: Wasabi (instead of chili or with 1 tsp chili)

instructions.step1: Cut fish into 2 cm cubes with a sharp knife
instructions.step2: Combine poke ingredients in a bowl, stir to coat fish and refrigerate for 30 minutes
instructions.step3: To make a bowl, start with rice cooled to room temperature, then add poke
instructions.step4: Top with as many ingredients as you want

title: Cilantro Chile Lime Shrimp
description: Stir fry spicy chile lime shrimp with cilantro.

item2.ingredient: shallot or green onions, diced (2 tbsp)

item6.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Peel shrimp under running water, set aside
instructions.step2: Heat olive oil in wok, add shallot and ginger saute for a minute or two
instructions.step3: Add chili's, sesame oil and shrimp, cook for 5 minutes covered, stirring several times to coat shrimp
instructions.step4: Remove from heat, add lime juice, cilantro, mix and serve over noodles with lime wedge

item4.ingredient: shallot or green onions, diced (2 tbsp)

item10.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Remove skin and cut salmon into 1 inch chunks
instructions.step2: Combine chili sauces and liquids in measuring cup and mix
instructions.step3: Heat olive and sesame oil in wok, add shallot and ginger, saute for a minute or two
instructions.step4: Add Thai seasoning, liquid mixture and salmon, cook for 5-10 minutes covered, stirring gently several times to coat salmon and ensure even cooking
instructions.step5: Remove from heat as soon as salmon flakes, let rest for a few minutes before serving over rice with sesame seed and cilantro garnish

title: Orange Chicken
description: Stir fry orange chicken loaded with veggies.

item2.ingredient: orange bell pepper, julienne or diced

item4.ingredient: shallot or  3-4 green onions, diced (2-3 tbsp)

item5.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Combine orange sauce ingredients in measuring cup and mix
instructions.step2: Prepare veggies and place into wok
instructions.step3: Add oil to large non-stick skillet and preheat over medium heat
instructions.step4: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step5: Place chicken into skillet and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step6: Turn heat to medium for veggies, stirring occasionally and kept covered
instructions.step7: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step8: Add sauce mixture to veggies and bring to low boil
instructions.step9: Add chicken to mixture, stir to coat evenly, turn off heat, leave covered for a few minutes
instructions.step10: Serve over rice, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions

title: Chicken Shawarma
description: Traditional grilled chicken shawarma or try it as a stir fry.

item10.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Sriracha, or 1 tsp cayenne

section1.title: Stir Fry Style
section1.step1: Combine yogurt sauce ingredients in a bowl and mix. Cover and put in fridge (will last for several days)
section1.step2: Place shallot, garlic and turmeric (if using fresh grated) and 1 tbsp oil into wok
section1.step3: Combine remaining sauce ingredients in measuring cup and mix
section1.step4: Add oil to large non-stick skillet and preheat over medium heat
section1.step5: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
section1.step6: Place chicken into skillet and turn up heat to medium-high
section1.step7: Turn heat to medium-low for veggies, stirring occasionally and kept covered
section1.step8: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
section1.step9: Add sauce mixture to veggies, stir and bring to low boil
section1.step10: Add chicken to mixture, stir to coat evenly, turn off heat, leave covered for a few minutes
section1.step11: Serve over couscous or rice, and garnish with cilantro

section2.title: Grilled
section2.step1: Combine marinade ingredients in a bowl or large zip-lock bag (skip the shallots and use powder for garlic)
section2.step2: Cut chicken into strips, add to marinade and massage to ensure chicken is thoroughly coated
section2.step3: Marinate for at least an hour or preferable overnight
section2.step4: Combine yogurt sauce ingredients in a bowl and mix. Cover and put in fridge (will last for several days)
section2.step5: Heat grill on medium high, cook for 4-5 minutes on each side until nicely charred
section2.step6: Remove from grill, drape with foil and let rest for 5 minutes
section2.step7: Slice chicken and serve with pita, salad and yogurt sauce

title: Szechuan Chicken
description: Stir fry Szechuan chicken loaded with veggies.

item1.ingredient: large red bell pepper, julienne or diced

item2.ingredient: large jalapeno pepper, julienne or diced

instructions.step1: Combine sauce ingredients in measuring cup and mix
instructions.step2: Add oil and layer veggies starting with onions, peppers ginger and garlic with in a wok
instructions.step3: Add oil to large non-stick skillet and preheat over medium heat
instructions.step4: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step5: Place chicken into skillet and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step6: Turn heat to medium for veggies, stirring occasionally and kept covered
instructions.step7: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step8: Add sauce mixture to veggies and bring to low boil
instructions.step9: Add chicken to wok and stir to coat evenly
instructions.step10: Serve over rice, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions

title: Sesame Chicken
description: Stir fry sesame chicken with mushrooms.

item10.ingredient: shallot or green onions, diced (2 tbsp)

item2.ingredient: fresh cilantro or green onion tops, chopped

instructions.step1: Add oils for sauce, shallots, and mushrooms to wok
instructions.step2: Combine the remaining sauce ingredients in measuring cup and mix
instructions.step3: Add oil to large non-stick skillet and preheat over medium heat
instructions.step4: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step5: Place chicken into skillet, spread evenly and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step6: Turn on wok to medium low, stirring occasionally and kept covered
instructions.step7: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step8: Add sauce mixture to wok and bring to low boil
instructions.step9: Add chicken to wok, stir to coat evenly, turn off heat, leave uncovered for a few minutes
instructions.step10: Serve over rice, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions

title: Strawberry Pancakes
description: Buttermilk pancakes with diced strawberries and/or blueberries.

instructions.step1: Combine flour, oats, and baking powder in mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a separate bowl beat egg, then add oil and buttermilk and blend thoroughly
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps. Let rest 10-30 minutes, then fold in fruit
instructions.step4: Cook in non-stick skillet at 325-350 degrees

title: Apple Pancakes
description: Buttermilk pancakes with grated apple and spices.

item2.ingredient: grated or finely diced peeled and cored apples

instructions.step1: Combine flour, oats, cinnamon, sugar and baking powder in mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a separate bowl beat egg, then add oil and buttermilk and blend thoroughly
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps. Let rest 10-30 minutes, then fold in fruit
instructions.step4: Cook in non-stick skillet at 325-350 degrees

title: Spicy Pear Pancakes
description: Buttermilk pancakes with diced pear and spices.

instructions.step1: Combine flour, oats, spices, and baking powder in mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a separate bowl beat egg, then add oil and buttermilk and blend thoroughly
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps. Let rest 10-30 minutes, then fold in fruit
instructions.step4: Cook in non-stick skillet at 325-350 degrees

title: Banana Muffins
description: Whole wheat banana muffins.

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees
instructions.step2: Combine flour, oats, sugar, baking powder and soda, (nuts or apricots) in mixing bowl
instructions.step3: In a 2 cup mixing cup beat egg, then measure in oil, add vanilla and buttermilk, blend thoroughly
instructions.step4: Mash bananas in a separate bowl
instructions.step5: Add liquid mixture and bananas to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps
instructions.step6: Fold in pecans or apricots if desired
instructions.step7: Spray muffin pan with non-stick spray
instructions.step8: Spoon mixture into muffin pan, sprinkle coarse sugar on muffin tops

title: Banana Bread
description: Banana bread with pecans.

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees
instructions.step2: Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and sugar in mixing bowl
instructions.step3: In another mixing bowl beat eggs, oil, and vanilla
instructions.step4: Mash bananas in a separate bowl
instructions.step5: Add liquid mixture and bananas to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps
instructions.step6: Fold in nuts
instructions.step7: Spray 8 inch bread pan with non-stick spray
instructions.step9: Bake for 60-65 minutes, or until toothpick inserted near center comes out clean
instructions.step10: Cool in pan for 10 minutes, remove from pan and cool. For easier slicing wrap and store overnight.

title: Orange Pumpkin Bread
description: Orange pumpkin bread, made with a whole orange raisins and pecans.

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees
instructions.step2: Cut orange into wedges, remove seeds, process orange, peel and all in a food processor until finely chopped
instructions.step3: In a large bowl, cream oil, sugar until smooth
instructions.step4: Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in pumpkin, water and orange
instructions.step5: In a separate bowl, mix the dry ingredients together
instructions.step6: Stir into batter until just until moistened
instructions.step8: Spray 9x5 inch loaf pan with non-stick spray (or use multiple smaller pans)
instructions.step10: Bake for 60 minutes, or until toothpick inserted near center comes out clean
instructions.step11: Cool in pan for 10 minutes, remove from pan and cool. For easier slicing wrap and store overnight.

notes: Parchment paper on the bottom helps the loaves come out clean. Smaller loaves require less time, 45 minutes or so.

title: Pumpkin Muffins
description: Whole wheat muffins with spiced pumpkin.

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees
instructions.step2: Combine flour, oats, sugar, baking powder and soda in mixing bowl
instructions.step3: In a 2 cup mixing cup beat egg, then measure in oil, add vanilla and buttermilk, blend thoroughly
instructions.step4: Add liquid mixture and pumpkin to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps
instructions.step5: Fold in pecans and chocolate chips if desired
instructions.step6: Spray muffin pan with non-stick spray
instructions.step7: Spoon mixture into muffin pan, sprinkle coarse sugar on tops

title: Buttermilk Waffles
description: Buttermilk whole wheat waffles.

instructions.step1: Combine flour, oats, baking powder and soda in mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a separate bowl beat egg, then mix in oil, add buttermilk and blend thoroughly
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps. Let rest 10-30 minutes
instructions.step4: Cook in non-stick waffle iron
instructions.step5: Serve with honey, maple or berry syrup

title: Pumpkin Waffles
description: Whole wheat waffles with spiced pumpkin.

instructions.step1: Combine flour, oats, baking powder and spice in mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a separate bowl beat egg, then mix in oil and pumpkin, add buttermilk and blend thoroughly
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients, mixing just enough to combine, adding milk to proper consistency. Do not over mix, as you want small lumps. Let rest 10-30 minutes
instructions.step4: Cook in non-stick waffle iron
instructions.step5: Serve with honey, maple or berry syrup

title: Apricot Scones
description: Low fat scones with apricots and whole wheat flour.

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees
instructions.step2: Mix dry ingredients, cut butter in with pastry knife, add apricots and pecans
instructions.step3: Whisk eggs and buttermilk, add to dry ingredients and mix just until sticky
instructions.step4: Turn out dough onto lightly floured surface and knead lightly
instructions.step5: Pat dough into 9” circle on pan lightly sprayed with cooking oil
instructions.step6: Cut into 12 wedges, cutting not quite all the way
instructions.step7: Sprinkle with granular sugar and cinnamon
instructions.step9: Cut with spatula and place individual scones on cooling rack

title: Anadama Bread
description: Whole wheat bread with molasses and cornmeal.

item9.ingredient: bread machine or instant yeast (1 1/2 at low altitude)

item10.ingredient: sunflower, pumpkin, flax seeds or cracked wheat (optional)

instructions.step1: Measure ingredients into bread machine pan, select basic cycle to raise but not cook. Additional white flour and rise time may be needed
instructions.step2: Remove from pan, roll to remove bubbles form into loaf and place into bread pan coated with non-stick spray
instructions.step3: Cover and let rise for about an hour until dough has doubled in size
instructions.step4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and bake bread for 35 minutes (rolls for 15-20 minutes)
instructions.step5: Remove from pan and place on a cooling rack

notes: Rolls or buns may be made using 60g portions of dough rolled in small amount of cornmeal for extra crunch.
